Fields

BypassCompositor

If SDL disables the compositor.

public readonly bool BypassCompositor

Field Value

bool

Remarks

On Linux, SDL will disable the compositor by default. Since not all applications want to do that, we can specify it manually.

Methods

CreateAvailableInputHandlers()

Construct all input handlers for this host. The order here decides the priority given to handlers, with the earliest occurring having higher priority.

protected override IEnumerable<InputHandler> CreateAvailableInputHandlers()

IEnumerable<InputHandler>
